4. Municipal Courts

Municipal Courts
================

INFORMATION
===========

**Court appearances are virtual only on:**[Tuesday & Thursday at 10 a.m. and 3:00 p.m. at **https://8x8.vc/copitx/court**](https://8x8.vc/copitx/court)  
  
**CONTACT: (**956)943-0760 or (956)943-0761.  
**Court Admin:**[court@copitx.com](mailto:court@copitx.com).  
**Court Clerk:**cclerk@copitx.com.

PAYMENT
=======

**Pay ONLINE here:** [Municipal Court Payments](https://www.municipalonlinepayments.com/portisabeltx/court/)  
The Municipal Court will accept **Cash, Credit/Debit Card or Money Order**.  
Please make your **money order** payable to  
City of Port Isabel Municipal Court   
and **mail it to**:  
Port Isabel Municipal Court  
110 W. Hickman St.  
Port Isabel, TX 78578

   110 W. Hickman St.  
   Port Isabel, TX 78578
